channel.title: FIX API related Blogs on We make FIX API easier to use.
channel.description: Recent content in FIX API related Blogs on We make FIX API easier to use.

item.title: What is FIX API? Why is FIX API helpful?
item.description: FIX API. FIX is the so-called Financial Information eXchange (FIX) protocol.

item.title: FIX API Starter Application Class
item.description: This is the FIX API Starter Application Class. It includes:

item.title: Start & End FIX API Starter Application
item.description: This part includes the main function for initialization and the onExit function for destruction.

item.title: Start Data FIX Session
item.description: This part of the FIX API Starter application takes the responsibility to start a FIX API Data Session.

item.title: Start Order FIX Session
item.description: This part of the FIX API Starter application takes the responsibility to start a FIX API Order Session.

item.title: Data FIX API Class
item.description: This is the main engine for FIX API Data session.

item.title: Data FIX API Class Basic Components
item.description: These are the basic components for FIX API Data class.

item.title: DATA FIX API ~ Send Market Data Request List
item.description: This is a function to send a subscription request message for streaming quotes.

item.title: DATA FIX API ~ Market Data Snapshot Full Refresh
item.description: This is a callback function to receive streaming quote messages once the market movements change.

item.title: DATA FIX API ~ Market Data Incremental Refresh
item.description: This is a callback function to receive streaming quote messages once the market movements change.

item.title: Order FIX API Class
item.description: This is the main engine for FIX API Order/Trade session.

item.title: Order FIX API Class Basic Components
item.description: These are the basic components for FIX API Order class.

item.title: ORDER FIX API ~ Send Market Order
item.description: This is a function to send a message to place an order.

item.title: ORDER FIX API ~ Execution Report
item.description: This is the most important callback function to receive execution report message once the status of an order changes.

item.title: End Data FIX Session
item.description: This method will be called to close FIX API Data session.

item.title: End Order FIX Session
item.description: This method will be called to close FIX API Order session.
